value.title: Predict numeric values with regression
value.excerpt: Use machine learning regression models to predict numeric values. Build multiple variations of linear regression models to estimate things like internet traffic.

value.title: Simplify access and identity provisioning with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about identity governance and how you can safeguard access to your organization’s data.

value.title: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory

value.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

value.title: Secure your Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure’s role-based access control to effectively manage your team’s access to Azure resources.

value.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: How to create an Azure SQL database | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to create an Azure SQL Database in the Azure Portal and how you can be more productive in Azure.    Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com   Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal

value.title: Azure for the Data Engineer
value.excerpt: This learning path guides data engineers through the evolving benefits your organization gains with Azure cloud data platform technologies.

topItems.title: Understand the evolving world of data
topItems.excerpt: Discover how data systems and roles are evolving and explore the differences between on-premises and cloud data solutions using sample business cases.

topItems.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform
topItems.excerpt: Explore the broad array of Azure technologies that analyze text or images and relational, nonrelational, or streaming data.

topItems.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the responsibilities of a data engineer, how they relate to the jobs of other data and AI roles, and explore common data engineering practices.

value.title: Automate Azure tasks using scripts with PowerShell
value.excerpt: Learn how to install Azure PowerShell on Linux, macOS, or Windows and then connect to Azure and manage your resources.

value.title: Connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft global network by using ExpressRoute
value.excerpt: Connect your on-premises systems and users to Azure and Office 365 by using ExpressRoute for private, dedicated, and guaranteed throughput connectivity.

value.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
value.excerpt: Learn about the responsibilities of a data engineer, how they relate to the jobs of other data and AI roles, and explore common data engineering practices.

value.excerpt: Explore data ingestion in Azure

value.title: Introduction to open-source database migration on Azure
value.excerpt: "Introduction to open-source database migration on Azure"

value.title: Introduction to GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to use key GitHub features, including issues, notifications, branches, commits, and pull requests.

value.title: Manage access to an Azure subscription by using Azure role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Learn how to assign management access to a subscription by using Azure role-based access control.

value.title: Read text with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Optical character recognition (OCR) enables artificial intelligence (AI) systems to read text in images, enabling applications to extract information from photographs, scanned documents, and other sources of digitized text.

value.title: How to build and deploy a containerized app to Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jay Gordon (@jaydestro) joins Donovan Brown (@donovanbrown) to show how to build a containerized React application and deploy it to production with Azure Kubernetes Service. He'll also show how to configure an Azure Active Directory service principal to enable Role-Based Authentication, which enables
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/E9YWmbUb9Ps" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to choose which services to use in Azure | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In this video, Azure MVP Barry Luijbregts chats with Scott Hanselman about how he goes about choosing the right services in Azure to run his applications and store his data. value.title: How to use Azure Bastion to connect securely to your Azure VMs | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Using a bastion host can help limit threats such as port scanning and other types of malware targeting your VMs. Ashish Jain joins Scott Hanselman to show how Azure Bastion gives you secure and seamless RDP and SSH access to your virtual machines. Now you can securely access your VMs over SSL from the

value.title: Create Intelligent Bots with the Azure Bot Service
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how to build a chat bot to interact with customers using text, graphics, or speech with extras from QnA Maker and LUIS.

topItems.title: Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create a bot that answers frequently asked questions.

value.title: Align requirements with cloud types and service models in Azure
value.excerpt: Discover Azure's three approaches to deploying cloud resources -- public, private, and hybrid -- and learn the difference each makes in your Azure services.

value.title: Analyze images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: The Computer Vision service enables software engineers to create intelligent solutions that extract information from images; a common task in many artificial intelligence (AI) scenarios.

value.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
value.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

value.title: Analyze receipts with the Form Recognizer service
value.excerpt: Processing invoices and receipts is a common task in many business scenarios. Increasingly, organizations are turning to artificial intelligence (AI) to automate data extraction from scanned receipts.

value.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
value.excerpt: Learn how using key principles throughout your cloud architecture can help you design and build a solid architectural foundation that you can continuously improve.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
value.excerpt: Learn how to adjust your capacity based on workload and how to optimize network performance, storage, and database performance.

value.title: Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a bot that answers frequently asked questions.

value.title: Connect an app to Azure Storage
value.excerpt: Create a simple application and add configuration, client library references, and C# or JavaScript code to connect it to Azure Storage.
